indicators.name: Resilience of maize yield: Effects of Fertilizer
indicators.query: SELECT category, estimate::numeric as y, iso3, std_error::numeric as z, variable as x, variable as label FROM resilience_maize_analysis_tool where category like 'Fertilizer' or category like 'Climate' and iso3='%1'

indicators.name: Resilience of maize yield: Effects of Education
indicators.query: SELECT category, estimate::numeric as y, iso3, std_error::numeric as z, variable as x, variable as label FROM resilience_maize_analysis_tool where category like 'Education' or category like 'Climate' and iso3='%1'

indicators.name: Resilience of maize yield: Effects of Irrigation and seed
indicators.query: SELECT category, estimate::numeric as y, iso3, std_error::numeric as z, variable as x, variable as label FROM resilience_maize_analysis_tool where category like 'Irrigation and seed' or category like 'Climate' and iso3='%1'

indicators.name: Resilience of maize yield: Effects of Extension services
indicators.query: SELECT category, estimate::numeric as y, iso3, std_error::numeric as z, variable as x, variable as label FROM resilience_maize_analysis_tool where category like 'Extension services' or category like 'Climate' and iso3='%1'

indicators.name: Resilience of maize yield: Effects of Soil quality
indicators.query: SELECT category, estimate::numeric as y, iso3, std_error::numeric as z, variable as x, variable as label FROM resilience_maize_analysis_tool where category like 'Soil quality' or category like 'Climate' and iso3='%1'

indicators.name: Resilience of food security
indicators.query: with tru as (SELECT count(food_secure) x, scenario FROM resilience_maize_predictions where scenario like '%extension = observed' and iso3='%1' and food_secure = 'True'  group by food_secure, scenario), fals as (SELECT count(food_secure)as y, scenario FROM resilience_maize_predictions where scenario like '%extension = observed' and iso3='%1' and food_secure = 'False'  group by food_secure, scenario) select tru.scenario, tru.scenario as label, x, y from tru left join fals on tru.scenario=fals.scenario

indicators.name: National
indicators.query: with raster as (select the_raster_webmercator, 'TZA' as iso3 from soil_carbon_deficit_sagcot union select the_raster_webmercator, 'GHA' as iso3 from soil_carbon_deficit_gha) select round((ST_SummaryStats(st_union(the_raster_webmercator))).mean::numeric,2) as value from raster where iso3='%1'

indicators.name: Landscape
indicators.query: SELECT landscape as x, landscape as label, round(value::numeric,2) as value, thread as category FROM vs_indicators_landscape where thread='Soil health' and variable = 'Partial nutrient budget indicator mean' and iso3='%1'

indicators.name: National
indicators.query: with raster as (select ST_Clip(the_raster_webmercator, the_geom_webmercator, true) as the_raster_webmercator, 'GHA' as iso3 from gh_tm1_57palglobdem_landcover, (select the_geom_webmercator from vs_countries where iso3 = 'GHA') g union select ST_Clip(the_raster_webmercator, the_geom_webmercator, true) as the_raster_webmercator, '%1' as iso3 from tz_tm1_57palglobdem_landcover, (select the_geom_webmercator from vs_countries where iso3 = '%1') t union select ST_Clip(the_raster_webmercator, the_geom_webmercator, true) as the_raster_webmercator, 'UGA' as iso3 from ug_tm1_57palglobdem_landcover,(select the_geom_webmercator from vs_countries where iso3 = 'UGA') u ), pas as (select st_union(the_geom_webmercator) as the_geom_webmercator from wdpa_polygons where iso3 ='%1'), inside as (select  (ST_ValueCount(st_union(the_raster_webmercator))).* from raster, pas  where iso3='%1' and st_intersects(the_raster_webmercator, the_geom_webmercator) order by value asc), all_v as (select  (ST_ValueCount(st_union(the_raster_webmercator))).* from raster  where iso3='%1' order by value asc), result as (select round((all_v.count-inside.count)*0.37385,2) as outside, round(inside.count*0.37385,2) as inside, class from all_v inner join inside on all_v.value=inside.value inner join vs_family3_attribute_table on all_v.value=code) select class as label, unnest(array['inside', 'outside']) AS category, unnest(array[inside, outside]) AS value from result

indicators.name: Landscape inside of protected areas
indicators.query: with raster as (select ST_Clip(the_raster_webmercator, the_geom_webmercator, true) as the_raster_webmercator, 'GHA' as iso3 from gh_tm1_57palglobdem_landcover, (select the_geom_webmercator from vs_countries where iso3 = 'GHA') g where st_intersects(the_raster_webmercator, the_geom_webmercator) union select ST_Clip(the_raster_webmercator, the_geom_webmercator, true) as the_raster_webmercator, 'TZA' as iso3 from tz_tm1_57palglobdem_landcover, (select the_geom_webmercator from vs_countries where iso3 = 'TZA') t where st_intersects(the_raster_webmercator, the_geom_webmercator) union select ST_Clip(the_raster_webmercator, the_geom_webmercator, true) as the_raster_webmercator, 'UGA' as iso3 from ug_tm1_57palglobdem_landcover,(select the_geom_webmercator from vs_countries where iso3 = 'UGA') u where st_intersects(the_raster_webmercator, the_geom_webmercator)), re as (SELECT distinct (landscape__) landscape__, country,st_transform(ST_GeomFromText(wkt_geom, 4326),3857) as weom  FROM coordinates_landscapes_wgs84_1,(select the_geom_webmercator from wdpa_polygons where iso3='GHA') pa  where wkt_geom <> '' and st_intersects(st_transform(ST_GeomFromText(wkt_geom, 4326),3857), pa.the_geom_webmercator) and  country='GHA'), landscapes as (select landscape__, country, st_transform(ST_GeomFromText(wkt_geom, 4326),3857)as weom, 'false' is_on from coordinates_landscapes_wgs84_1 where wkt_geom <> '' and  country='GHA' and landscape__ not in(select landscape__ from re) union select *, 'true' is_on from re), data as (select  (ST_ValueCount(st_union(the_raster_webmercator))).*, landscape__ from raster, landscapes  where st_intersects(the_raster_webmercator, weom) group by landscape__ order by landscape__,value asc), solution as (select round(data.count*0.37385,2) as y, data.landscape__, data.value as x,landscapes.is_on,class as label from data inner join landscapes on landscapes.landscape__=data.landscape__ inner join vs_family3_attribute_table on data.value=code) select label, landscape__ as category, y as value from solution where is_on ='true'

indicators.name: Landscape outside of protected areas
indicators.query: with raster as (select ST_Clip(the_raster_webmercator, the_geom_webmercator, true) as the_raster_webmercator, 'GHA' as iso3 from gh_tm1_57palglobdem_landcover, (select the_geom_webmercator from vs_countries where iso3 = 'GHA') g where st_intersects(the_raster_webmercator, the_geom_webmercator) union select ST_Clip(the_raster_webmercator, the_geom_webmercator, true) as the_raster_webmercator, 'TZA' as iso3 from tz_tm1_57palglobdem_landcover, (select the_geom_webmercator from vs_countries where iso3 = 'TZA') t where st_intersects(the_raster_webmercator, the_geom_webmercator) union select ST_Clip(the_raster_webmercator, the_geom_webmercator, true) as the_raster_webmercator, 'UGA' as iso3 from ug_tm1_57palglobdem_landcover,(select the_geom_webmercator from vs_countries where iso3 = 'UGA') u where st_intersects(the_raster_webmercator, the_geom_webmercator)), re as (SELECT distinct (landscape__) landscape__, country,st_transform(ST_GeomFromText(wkt_geom, 4326),3857) as weom  FROM coordinates_landscapes_wgs84_1,(select the_geom_webmercator from wdpa_polygons where iso3='GHA') pa  where wkt_geom <> '' and st_intersects(st_transform(ST_GeomFromText(wkt_geom, 4326),3857), pa.the_geom_webmercator) and  country='GHA'), landscapes as (select landscape__, country, st_transform(ST_GeomFromText(wkt_geom, 4326),3857)as weom, 'false' is_on from coordinates_landscapes_wgs84_1 where wkt_geom <> '' and  country='GHA' and landscape__ not in(select landscape__ from re) union select *, 'true' is_on from re), data as (select  (ST_ValueCount(st_union(the_raster_webmercator))).*, landscape__ from raster, landscapes  where st_intersects(the_raster_webmercator, weom) group by landscape__ order by landscape__,value asc), solution as (select round(data.count*0.37385,2) as y, data.landscape__, data.value as x,landscapes.is_on,class as label from data inner join landscapes on landscapes.landscape__=data.landscape__ inner join vs_family3_attribute_table on data.value=code) select label, landscape__ as category, y as value from solution where is_on ='false'

indicators.name: Climate chart
indicators.query: with r as (SELECT s.month as x,s.month as name, round(value::numeric,1) as z, round(precip::numeric,1) as y, r.iso3  FROM cru_ts3_23_tmp_1985_2015_monthly r inner join monthly_mean_precip_1981_2014 s on r.iso3=s.iso3 and r.month=s.month) select * from r where iso3='%1'
